name: 民俗運動
description: Folk sports is a diverse group of sports and games that is related to folk culture. It include dragon dance, lion dance, diabolo tricks, jumping rope, kicking a hacky sack, flying kites and so on. This class will focus on the basic movements and traditional techniques of diabolo and different jump roping techniques.
syllabus:
